VL, Auckland, NZ Hale Pule is a centre for healing and education committed to sharing the ancient wisdom of Ayurveda and Yoga. Hale Pule was founded by [Myra Lewin](/myra-lewin) in 1999 with the intention of creating a healing space where people from all over the world can learn how to find balance in their lives. Since then, Hale Pule staff have supported thousands of people to reclaim their natural state of health. Hale Pule offers a range of in-person and online [ Ayurveda](/ayurveda-training) and [Yoga](/yoga-training) trainings and [healing services ](/consultations/ayurvedic-health)designed to enhance vitality and well-being. Myra Lewin will guide you to become your own healer with the ancient sciences of Ayurveda and Yoga. Here you'll find bite-sized meditations designed to connect you to your intuitive energy - that infinite intelligence that resides within.
